title: One day's poison
creator_credit: David Bairstow, ONF | NFB and Donald Wilder
brief_description: Describes the work of the poison control centre at the Toronto Sick Children’s Hospital, using dramatised incidents to illustrate the variety and number of accidental poisoning’s among children. (Award: Toronto.)
